#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int d[10]={0, 1, 4, 3, 8, 5, 2, 7, 6, 9};
ll func(ll);
ll func2(ll);
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    ll a,b,c1,c2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        c1=func(a);
        c2=func(b+1);
        cout<<c2-c1<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
ll func2(ll y)
{
    if(y/10 == 0)
        return d[y];
    else
        return ((func2(y/10) + func2(y%10)) % 10);
}
ll func(ll x)
{
    if(x%10==0)
        return 45*(x/10);
    else
        return (func(x-1) + func2(x-1));
}
